PageInfo.Message:
<COL ffdc78>"Stamp Bonus"</COL> is a proof mark
sent to you every time you visit this world, when
you log in.
Once a day, you can receive rewards such as Rift
Crystals and Silver Tickets as a reward along with
the proof "Stamp of Resurrection/ Login Stamp"
from Ophelia, the temple attendant.
Stamps reset daily, allowing you to receive them
again.

There are two types of stamp bonuses.
<Consecutive Stamp Bonus>
This is a proof obtained by logging in
consecutively every day.
The rewards change depending on the consecutive
days, and if interrupted, it will start from day 1
again.
<Accumulated Stamp Bonus>
This is a bonus based on the cumulative login
days.
The rewards change depending on the cumulative
days.

You can receive stamp bonuses. Rift Crystals and
Silver Tickets are very useful for adventures.
If you forget to receive them on every day, you
will miss out on counting those days. So be sure
to always receive them without fail.
